data.name: Gravity Mastery
data.detailed_description:
The Adviser welcomes any and all challengers. Worlds were crafted with the purpose of disorienting and misleading the uninitiated challengers overconfident in their own abilities. Although many have failed, there must come a time where someone succeeds. The Adviser has long awaited for someone crafty enough to pass an arrangement tests. Perhaps that someone is you. Don't just defy gravity, control it. The gauntlet of trials awaits.

The rules are simple. Each trial consists of several red cubes and green spheres. Once every red cube simultaneously contains a green sphere, then the trial has been successfully completed.

Key Features


  • Strategize solutions to self-contained levels.
  • Varied levels with compounding gameplay mechanics.
  • Compete against the clock in time-trial mode to find the optimal time to beat a level.
  • Hand-crafted puzzles with progressing difficult.
  • Minimalistic art style where every resource at your disposal is visually apparent and clearly defined.

data.short_description: A perspective-disorienting puzzler where the definition of down is yours to decide. Change the flow of gravity to complete each of The Adviser's varied, but logical tests. Can you become proficient enough to control the six directions and master gravity?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
